stories.title: i should have the ability to edit and delete an epic
stories.description: on epic page i can open and epic edit it and delete it

stories.title: Epics should have only 2 status inprogress and done
group by : the swimlanes should have the epic color boarder  if they are epic related ..
stats on epic card
stories.description:
on epic card it should give us status 
total tickets per type per status

stories.title: Filters on Epic managmenet
stories.description:
on epic management page we need 
1 - search 
2 - status filter
3 - assigend filter
and epic management page should have a board with two status 
todo inprogress and done

stories.title: ability to create a ticket from inside epic
stories.description:
inside epic edit screen i should have the ability to create a ticket 
it should auto assign it to the epic 
default type should be story 
default assigned should be who ever the epic is assigned too

stories.title: prevent delete epic
stories.description:
if there is any thing attached to epic e.g. story or bug 
then it should not be deletble 
the button should be disabled

stories.title: epic filters shold be in the left filter pannel
stories.description:
current epic filters are on top they should be in left filter pannel and should show the exact format as board filter 
but only show epic filters

stories.title: epic management board should have the same status in column as defined in project setting
epic board should have darg drop as well
when stories being created are through epic flow default assiginie should be the epic assignie
on epic create and edit i need the ability to edit detail
epics status select in edit and create should be that from the board
on epic card i need a short cut to create stories
Left Nav alignment
stories.description:
left nav (control nav) 
we will term this control name 
it should have two section 
top align and bottom align 

top align is data 
bottom align is management 

users 
profile
log out
shoudl be in bottom align

stories.title: epic card should be collapsable
stories.description: it should have all the features from that of cards on story board

stories.title: when ever there is a api update to status the board does not reflect the change
stories.description:
when we make change sto the board through api or s different user loged in the board does not refresh 
refresh the board but do it in such a way the if i have a edit story or edit epic open it should not close or loose state of that window

stories.title: when ever there is a state change done by any user there should be a bubble notification
stories.description:
if i make state chages to cards storyies or bugs 
i dont need to see the buble notification 
but when its done by some one else or api i should see a bubble notification

stories.title: epic board should follow the same look and feel and functionality as that of story board
stories.description:
same format 
same look and feel it should be very similar just the title should be epic board vs story board

stories.title: in story board when i group by any thing that group should be collapsable
when group by type story should be green boarded and bug should be red boarded
for epic card type and status shouild be visual
stories.description:
Categorical Color Bar Green Vs Red for story and bug with a tool tip for counts 
and for status
use should choose color ur self but inprogress should be green done should be blue 
todo should be red and backlog should be yellow 
any other status you pick use self

stories.title: new story on epic
stories.description:
lost the new story button on epic bring it back as a + icon 
and bottom left 
also the card is not as compact as it should be (look at story card make it similar compact)

stories.title: when i click on epic and epic edit opens up it should show me a list of all sub tickets
stories.description:
list of all sub tickets with identifier title type and assigned 
make sure it does not go out of the screen

stories.title: on story board i need total (5) per column
stories.description:
on story board i need how many tickets are in that board right now as a count
if i apply filter the count should reflect that

stories.title: epic board per column count
stories.description:
on epic board i need total on top for each column 
if i apply filters it should reflect the filter in counts

stories.title: in epic subticket list i need status as well
stories.description: in epic edit wjhere there is sub tickets i need the status as well

stories.title: percent done on epic card
stories.description:
on epic card i need percent done 
thats all statuses exception done vs done

stories.title: app crashes with console error
stories.description:
when i click on some epics the app crashes 

App.jsx:912 Uncaught ReferenceError: columnsByProject is not defined
    at App.jsx:912:29
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at TaskDetailsPanel (App.jsx:904:30)

stories.title: remove story count from epic card
stories.description:
remove story count from epic count 
percent done should be in a pill 
if its 75 % done make it green 
0-40 make it red 
41-74 make it blue

stories.title: group by priorty boarder color
stories.description:
priority boarder should be coloered 
Red for High 
Orange for medium 
yellow for low

stories.title: user search and filter
stories.description:
they should be in filter pannel in the left 
not above the screen 
Filter pannel should follow story board filter pannel pattern

stories.title: user create flow
stories.description:
on user index page there should be a + new user button  (in header look at story baord)
and when click on that the create user form shold be in modal

stories.title: on user index i wana see a list of users in a table with modification opens Edit / active/inavtive ....
stories.description:
there should be a table with user info 
and then when i edit it it should open up a modal with info 

if the user is active it shold give me option to deactive and wise versa from the table

stories.title: in user filters i need project filter as well
in user table i need ability to generate api key and password
stories.description: it will com up in a popup and i can simple 1 click copy abilitiy for that

stories.title: Project list UI
stories.description: similar to user list and user filter

stories.title: Project filters
stories.description: similar to user list and user filter

stories.title: i should not be able to delete proejcts if they have tickets in them
from table i shold turn to project cards .. by simply clicking an icon and on on project card i need to know stats
stories.description:
t evah dluohs i
i wana know 
in pills
how many users
how many epics 
how many stories 
how many bugs 
% done for tickets

stories.title: on project create and edit user should be able to select flow status
stories.description:
right now we have backlog todo inprogress  and done 
user should be able to add status that should appear as column in story and epic board

stories.title: story board dynamic columns
stories.description:
status is defined in project settings
story board should pick columns from project settings 
stories and bugs should pic status from project settings

stories.title: epic bolard colummms
stories.description: epic board should pick columns and status for epics from project settings

stories.title: story board shold have no stories in column where there are no stories just like epic board
epic board to follow same style sheet as that of story board
stories.description: epic board and epic card style sheet should be similar to story board and story card

stories.title: do a code audit remove all hard coded values
stories.description:
perform a code audit remove all hard coded users names and password 
get them from logged in user if there are any make the code base project redy then leave a read me in the code base for the project and its deployment and setup include step by step deployment instrauction
